name: Sir Pouncelot
description: A giant orange cat wearing a scarf emblazoned with the Knights of Favonius insignia. It was once a very fierce creature due to having long been subject to stimulating encounters with wild creatures, but after much comforting from you and Paimon, it has become an obedient kitty once more.\nIts scarf was a gift from the Investigation Team, but past experience demonstrated that it could not be the "Interim Team Feline" indefinitely. As such, Albedo has suggested that you and Paimon take care of it... which is just fine by Paimon.\nAfter arriving in The Realm Within, Sir Pouncelot has stepped out of the shadow of its past, growing used to this leisurely lifestyle...
